text: Jakson Da Trindade (born 13 June 1994), commonly known as Capito, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a forward for Sporting Praia Cruz and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Capito made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe on 4 September 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players
title: Capito (footballer)
